radiographic_examinations.findings: Bibasilar subsegmental atelectasis; normal liver, pancreas, spleen, adrenal glands; several renal cysts (largest 3 cm); small hiatus hernia; diffusely distended small bowel; postoperative changes including free air and suture material at the cecum; few diverticuli without diverticulitis; small volume free fluid in the pelvis, likely postoperative.
